headline: Raymond James Keeps Palo Alto (PANW) at Market Perform After Earnings Beat
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is one of the Trending AI Stocks in Focus This Week. On August 18, Raymond James analyst Adam Tindle reiterated a Market Perform rating on the stock without a price target. The rating affirmation follows Palo Alto’s better-than-expected quarterly results and guidance. The firm noted how revenue, RPO, and bookings metrics […]

headline: Binarly Names Rick Congdon Independent Board Member and Strategic Advisor; Appoints AppSec Leader Chris Eng as Strategic Advisor
summary: SANTA MONICA, Calif., August 20, 2025--Binarly, the industry leader in software and firmware supply‑chain security, today announced Rick Congdon has joined the company as an Independent Board Member and Strategic Advisor. Congdon will provide expert guidance to steer Binarly’s global go-to-market and enterprise sales strategy.

raw.headline: Binarly Names Rick Congdon Independent Board Member and Strategic Advisor; Appoints AppSec Leader Chris Eng as Strategic Advisor

Congdon will provide expert guidance to steer Binarly’s global go-to-market and enterprise sales strategy.
